[Document Review Protocol(80929109.3) (1).docx, p.1]
This is an arbitration matter between Channel IT Isle of Man Ltd. ("CITIOM") and Gulfstream Aerospace Corporation regarding maintenance services performed on a Gulfstream G550 aircraft (Serial No. 5174) (the ‘Aircraft’) at Gulfstream's St. Louis facility. Key issues involve the preparation and execution of a maintenance proposal dated June 2, 2023, scope and cost of work on Aircraft, estimated return to service date of Aircraft, subsequent maintenance work, and related workforce/timeline matters.

[Document Review Protocol(80929109.3) (1).docx, p.1]
Return to service (RTS) - Estimated vs. actual dates

[Document Review Protocol(80929109.3) (1).docx, p.1]
This is an arbitration matter between Channel IT Isle of Man Ltd. ("CITIOM") and Gulfstream Aerospace Corporation regarding maintenance services performed on a Gulfstream G550 aircraft (Serial No. 5174) (the ‘Aircraft’) at Gulfstream's St. Louis facility. Key issues involve the preparation and execution of a maintenance proposal dated June 2, 2023, scope and cost of work on Aircraft, estimated return to service date of Aircraft, subsequent maintenance work, and related workforce/timeline matters.
